activities: Axialent collects personal data that is provided by our clients or our clients' employees. This information is used by Axialent only to prepare reports for our clients’ employees who participate in a personal development process with Axialent or for a team/person within the client that participates in or commissions from Axialent a diagnostic and/or research and/or development process and for no other purpose.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Either on-line, off-line, manually processed data and human resources data
